revised_title: Corrections and Acknowledgements in Proceedings of the Royal Society of London
tldr: This article contains an apology and acknowledgement for errors made in the authorship and acknowledgements sections of previous issues of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. The errors have caused embarrassment to the affected individuals and the journal regrets these mistakes. The article also acknowledges the work of Dr Karen Burt on electron microscopy for a related paper.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Journal Management
